member.name: T:StandardExtensions
member.summary: Configuration extensions for the standard stuff.

member.summary: Logs to a custom logger.

member.summary: Logs to the console using pretty colours.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.LogScriptOutput(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Logs to the console using pretty colours.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.LogToTrace(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Logs to System.Diagnostics.Trace.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.LogToSqlContext(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Logs to SqlContext.Pipe, for use with "context connection=true".

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.JournalTo(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,DbUp.Engine.IJournal)
member.summary: Uses a custom journal for recording which scripts were executed.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScripts(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,DbUp.Engine.IScriptProvider)
member.summary: Adds a custom script provider to the upgrader.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScripts(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DbUp.Engine.SqlScript})
member.summary: Adds a static set of scripts to the upgrader.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScripts(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,DbUp.Engine.SqlScript[])
member.summary: Adds a static set of scripts to the upgrader.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScript(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,DbUp.Engine.SqlScript)
member.summary: Adds a single static script to the upgrader.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScript(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a single static script to the upgrader.
member.param: The name of the script. This should never change once executed.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsFromFileSystem(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Adds all scripts from a folder on the file system.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsFromFileSystem(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds all scripts from a folder on the file system, with a custom filter.
member.param: The filter. Use the static class to get some pre-defined filters.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsFromFileSystem(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts from a folder on the file system, with custom encoding.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsFromFileSystem(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts from a folder on the file system, with a custom filter and custom encoding.
member.param: The filter. Use the static class to get some pre-defined filters.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly, with custom encoding.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly, with custom encoding and with a custom filter (you'll need to exclude non- .SQL files yourself).
member.param: The filter. Don't forget to ignore any non- .SQL files.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly, with a custom filter (you'll need to exclude non- .SQL files yourself).
member.param: The filter. Don't forget to ignore any non- .SQL files.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsAndCodeEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly, or classes which inherit from IScript, with a custom filter (you'll need to exclude non- .SQL files yourself).

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsAndCodeEmbeddedInAssembly(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assembly, or classes which inherit from IScript, with a custom filter (you'll need to exclude non- .SQL files yourself).
member.param: The Sql Script filter (only affects embdeeded scripts, does not filter IScript files). Don't forget to ignore any non- .SQL files.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithPreprocessor(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,DbUp.Engine.IScriptPreprocessor)
member.summary: Adds a preprocessor that can replace portions of a script.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithVariables(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Adds a set of variables that will be replaced before scripts are executed.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithVariable(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a single variable that will be replaced before scripts are executed.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithVariablesDisabled(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Sets a configuration flag which will cause the engine to skip variable expansion.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithVariablesEnabled(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Sets a configuration flag which will cause the engine to perform variable expansion.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithExecutionTimeout(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Allows you to set the execution timeout for scripts.
member.param: A TimeSpan value containing the timeout value or null.
member.exception: The timeout value is less than zero or greater than 2,147,483,647 seconds.
member.remarks: Setting the timeout parameter to null will use the default timeout of the underlying provider.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithoutTransaction(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Run creates a new connection for each script, without a transaction

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithTransaction(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Run DbUp in a single transaction

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithTransactionPerScript(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder)
member.summary: Run each script in it's own transaction

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssemblies(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Adds all scripts ending in '.sql' found as embedded resources in the given assemblies, using the default .

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssemblies(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly[],System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds all scripts matching the specified filter found as embedded resources in the given assemblies, using the default .
member.param: The filter. Don't forget to ignore any non- .SQL files.

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssemblies(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly[],System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts ending in '.sql' found as embedded resources in the given assemblies, using the specified .

member.name: M:StandardExtensions.WithScriptsEmbeddedInAssemblies(DbUp.Builder.UpgradeEngineBuilder,System.Reflection.Assembly[],System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Adds all scripts found as embedded resources in the given assemblies, with a custom filter (you'll need to exclude non- .SQL files yourself).
member.param: The filter. Don't forget to ignore any non- .SQL files.

member.param: Name of the object to quote.
The settings which indicate if the whitespace should be dropped or not.
